Issue.creator: suryalnvs
Issue.summary: Raft OSN leader does not receive broadcasted transactions from ingress OSN
Issue.description: DEBU a0a2^ 0m Forwarding submit request to Raft leader 2 {"channel": "testorgschannel1", "node": 1} {code} In this case, orderer1st-ordererorg is the ingress OSN and orderer2nd-ordererorg is the leader from the above log. Attaching the logs for all the orderers and peer. ^snapshot-FAB-13809-orderer1st.log ^snapshot-FAB-13809-orderer2nd-leader.log ^snapshot-FAB-13809-orderer3rd.log ^snapshot-FAB-13809-peer1st.log ^ ^goroutines-ingress-orderer-nonleader.log ^ ^^ ^goroutines-orderer2-leader.log ^^ h2. Expected: The ingress OSN should broadcast the transaction, leader should receive the transaction and order it in the block. >
